name: Haunted door
description:
You are a long forgotten ghost whose very fond of doors, you travel the skies with your beautiful door, but those weird eyeballs just really seem to hate you and keep showing up and shooting at you.

  • WASD or arrows to move
  • SPACE to open the door and reflect bullets

Submitted to Curdle Jam #7 with the theme "Opportunity knocks".
How it fits the theme? you wait for the opportunity to open the door and reflect bullets (also added a bit of knocking sounds by the bullets hehe)
Other than the art I did everything by myself

Art used that requires contribution: 

https://opengameart.org/content/lpc-animated-doors
https://opengameart.org/content/halloween-animation-eye
https://opengameart.org/content/rotating-coin

https://game-icons.net/1x1/delapouite/bank.html
